plot: The back then and the not yet. A journey into the memory of John Ford, and for all those who did not succeed in seeing another land.
title: Another Land: Homage to John Ford
plot_es: The back then and the not yet. A journey into the memory of John Ford, and for all those who did not succeed in seeing another land.
original_name: Another Land: Homage to John Ford
plot_en: The back then and the not yet. A journey into the memory of John Ford, and for all those who did not succeed in seeing another land.
